ygData.subject: Re: Wisps and Warriors (was: Elf Hide Gloves)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 100% ... I killed about 10 wisps last night in EC and WC. They all conned blue to me at 13, about half risky and half upper hand . So I guess they re
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> I do seem
> to remember that some wisps were only yellow to me at 9th, but most were
> still red. My record keeping then was pretty sloppy though so I'm not
100%
> sure.

I killed about 10 wisps last night in EC and WC. They all conned blue to me
at 13, about half "risky" and half "upper hand". So I guess they're 10-12
lvl. I took them out easily with Bellow, Hymn and Chords w/ lute (no magic
weapon yet). I don't think I would have faired as well strictly using
Bellow, which leads me to think that a like-level warrior using only magic
H2H before the change would have a challenge and long downtime.

>
> I know warrior's don't get bellow but don't they have double attack by
then
> and dual wield?

My first char. when I was learning the game was a barb. warrior. They get
duel wield at 13 and double attack at 15 if I recall. If a 13 warrior had
twin combines, wisps would fall quickly, I think.

> I didn't have a magic weapon until 13th level
> and that was a dirk at 25p. I couldn't have afforded a combine back then
> because I was too busy having fun to make money ;)
>

OT: After last night I have 60+ pp in the bank. Ready to buy a Dragoon Dirk.
Where do you recommend I auction? Is 40pp reasonable? Thanks!

Operaman
Meandering Maestro of the 14th Song
Innoruuk
